main_definition: A period of time that an individual takes away from work or school to relax, travel, and enjoy leisure activities.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Time off for rest and recreation
meanings_and_examples.example: I'm taking a two-week vacation to Hawaii with my family.
The students are excited about their summer vacation, as they won't have to attend school for three months.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An opportunity to travel and explore new places
meanings_and_examples.example: Her dream is to go on a vacation to Europe every year during her time off work.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A period of leisure activity away from home or routine responsibilities
meanings_and_examples.example: He spent his vacation volunteering at an animal shelter and learning about wildlife conservation.
